text: Cast all your anxieties on Him, for He cares for you.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
I love You, O Lord, and for Your sake, I love my neighbor as myself.
Cast your burden on the Lord, and He will sustain you.
Trust in Him at all times; pour out your hearts to Him, for God is our refuge.
Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.
When the cares of my heart are many, Your consolations cheer my soul.
In God, whose word I praise, in God I trust; I shall not be afraid.
Let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.
Jesus said, 'Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.'
Commit your way to the Lord; trust in Him and He will do this.
Jesus said, 'My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.'
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and supplication, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God...
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him, and He helps me.
'Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength.'
Be still, and know that I am God.
Trust in the Lord forever, for the Lord, the Lord Himself, is the Rock eternal.
Jesus said, 'A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.'
The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them; He delivers them from all their troubles.
Those who know Your name trust in You, for You, Lord, have never forsaken those who seek You.
Dear children, let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.
